name: Apprentice
description: On your 1st night, you gain a Townsfolk ability (if good) or a Minion ability (if evil).
first_night_desc: Show the Apprentice the 'You are' card, then a Townsfolk or Minion token. In the Grimoire, replace the Apprentice token with that character token, and put the Apprentice's 'Is the Apprentice' reminder by that character token.
